name: Jenny Wilson
location: The Wilson's house,Old Man Harris' house
descriptions: Jenny Wilson is the daughter of Bill and Martha Wilson in Andale in 2277.
Jenny is a young girl who has a crush on her cousin Junior Smith, much to her parents' delight and Junior's dismay.

topics.response_text: Didn't your mother teach you any manners?

topics.topic_text: What do you think of the other people in Andale?
topics.response_text: Hey, did you know that I'm going to marry Junior Smith when I'm old enough? I know, he doesn't like girls now, but mommy says that he'll come around.

topics.topic_text: I'm sure you two will be great together.
topics.response_text: I know! His daddy and my daddy used to be brothers, so I think we'll make especially good uhm... uhm... married... people? What's the word?

topics.topic_text: A couple? Is that what you mean?
topics.response_text: Yes! That's it! We'll be a great couple!

topics.topic_text: I think "weird as all hell" is probably the best way to describe it.
topics.response_text: Oh my gosh! You said a swear! I'm telling! And that's four words, stupid.
My dad says that it's going to rain soon, do you think it will?
My daddy is never wrong. Ever. He's the smartest man in the whole world. Smarter than you.

topics.topic_text: I don't know, he doesn't seem very smart to me.
topics.response_text: Wow, what a jerk! You're lucky that I don't tell him what you said!

topics.topic_text: Yeah, he's a pretty smart guy.
topics.response_text: I knew it! Even you think he's smarter than you!
You're my hero, ma'am. I want to be just like you when I grow up.
